players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Bob is the mafia. He killed Diana. Vote him."
Charlie: remained silent.
Bob: remained silent.
Charlie: "I think Bob is mafia because he didn't speak."
Bob: "Alice, you claim I'm mafia, but you can't prove it. I was with Charlie when Diana died. Charlie, you saw me with her. No one else could have killed her."
You: "Bob is mafia. He killed Diana and stayed silent. His alibi with Charlie is false—Charlie never saw him with Diana. Vote Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
